data.title: Best Movies Like Jupiter Ascending
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Jupiter Ascending: John Carter (2012), Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017), Captain Marvel (2019), The Matrix 4 (2021), G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009), Divergent (2014), The 5th Wave (2016), Star Trek: Insurrection (1998), Ender's Game (2013), Insurgent (2015)
